result.longName: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited

assetProfile.address2: Sukhumvit 71 Road (Pridi Banomyong) Phrakanong Nuer Vadhana
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes processed food products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Production Food from Pork, Processed Seafood, Restaurants, and Swine Farm. It offers local foods, including sausages, pork rilo, jar yok, shredded pork, pork sticks, pork balls, crispy pork, and dried pork; sea foods, including shrimp balls, fish balls, fish tofu, and fried fish cake; frozen food items, such as pork leg, spicy soup, and cabbage soup with shiitake; snacks, including baked chicken breast, crispy pork, and roast chicken; and other food items, such as chilly flakes, herbal drink, and roasted red pork. The company produces processed seafood under Taechiew, Kwangchow, Kowloon, Mahachai, Odeng, Shanghai, Kaizen, Hong Kong, and Taipei brands. It is also involved in breeding and selling of finishing swine; distribution of processed food; and selling and lease of investment properties, as well as offers training and seminar services. S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
